title: ESD 与供电安全（通用）
checks: 维修台与腕带接地；防静电袋存放板件；避免潮湿环境。
拆机/拔插哈希板前断电并等待放电；PSU/高压侧谨慎操作。
检查 AC 线缆、PDU/插排额定；避免松动导致打火与温升。
任何单板上电测试必须配套散热（散热器/冷板/强制风冷）。
checks_en: Ground workbench and wrist strap; store boards in anti-static bags; avoid humid environments.
Power off and wait for discharge before disassembling/unplugging hash boards; exercise caution with PSU/high-voltage side.
Check AC cables, PDU/power strip ratings; prevent arcing and temperature rise from loose connections.
All single-board power-on testing must include cooling (heatsink/cold plate/forced air cooling).
maintenance_schedule: 每次拆装执行一次安全清单；每季度检查接插件温升与烧蚀。
maintenance_schedule_en: Execute safety checklist for each disassembly; quarterly inspection of connector temperature rise and burn marks.

title: 散热卫生与环境管理（通用）
checks: 保持风道通畅：过滤网/风道定期清洁；进风无遮挡。
检查风扇转速与异响；水冷检查水温/流量/气堵/漏液。
避免长期超频在高温环境运行；建立功率-温度边界策略。
checks_en: Keep airway clear: regularly clean filters/airways; ensure unobstructed inlet airflow.
Inspect fan speed and unusual noise; check water temp/flow/air locks/leaks for water cooling.
Avoid prolonged overclocking in high-temp environments; establish power-temperature boundary policies.
maintenance_schedule: 高粉尘：2–4 周清洁；常规：1–3 月深度清洁；水冷按水质/冷却液周期维护。
maintenance_schedule_en: High dust: clean every 2-4 weeks; normal: deep clean every 1-3 months; water cooling maintain per water quality/coolant cycle.

title: 配置/固件与变更管理（通用）
checks: 固件升级前备份配置与矿池；保留可回滚的稳定 profile。
升级时确保网络稳定、电源稳定；避免同时批量升级全场。
启用矿池 Failover；定期检查 DNS/NTP/网关与交换机状态。
checks_en: Backup configuration and pool settings before firmware upgrade; keep a rollback-ready stable profile.
Ensure stable network and power during upgrade; avoid batch upgrading the entire farm simultaneously.
Enable pool failover; regularly check DNS/NTP/gateway and switch status.
maintenance_schedule: 每次升级执行「升级前检查」；每月审查 failover 与矿池可用性。
maintenance_schedule_en: Execute pre-upgrade checklist for each upgrade; monthly review of failover and pool availability.
